definition: used of preliterate or tribal or nonindustrial societies, a word serving as the basis for inflected or derived forms
details:
adjective
- used of preliterate or tribal or nonindustrial societies
= example: used of preliterate or tribal or nonindustrial societies
- little evolved from or characteristic of an earlier ancestral type
= synonyms: archaic
- belonging to an early stage of technical development
= synonyms: crude, rude
- of or created by one without formal training
= synonyms: naive
noun
- a word serving as the basis for inflected or derived forms
= example: a word serving as the basis for inflected or derived forms
- a mathematical expression from which another expression is derived
- a person who belongs to an early stage of civilization
= synonyms: primitive person
